collation.cr:
[caseFirst upper] # DMS MSA 200:2009
# This collation follows Maltese Standard DMS MSA 200:2009 # The document is available at: # <http://www.kunsilltalmalti.gov.mt/filebank/documents/2009-10-14%20MSA%20Specification%20for%20Maltese%20locale%20(abbozz%20finali).pdf> # More information is available at: (search for "MSA 200") # <http://www.kunsilltalmalti.gov.mt/rizorsi>
&[before 1]c<ċ<<<Ċ &[before 1]g<ġ<<<Ġ # DMS 200:2009 says that "għ" shall be treated as one letter. &[before 1]h<għ<<<gĦ<<<Għ<<<GĦ # DMS 200:2009 says that "ie" shall be treated as two letters: i + e. &[before 1]i<ħ<<<Ħ &[before 1]z<ż<<<Ż
